name: Candi & the Four Humors
description:
"Just take some kids trick or treating!" my friend said. "It'll be easy!" my friend said. They're good kids, so all you've gotta do is take them to a couple of neighborhoods, walk them between houses, and make sure they don't get poisoned or pick up razor blades or anything.

And listen, I know little kids can be monsters sometimes, but... how hard can it be?

CW: Descriptions of violence, dark humor, Chick tracts

CREDITS

T. Incognita
